clinical_study.brief_title: Medical Consortium for Screening Upper Gastrointestinal Cancers With Magnetically Controlled Capsule Gastroscopy
clinical_study.official_title: Medical Consortium for Screening Upper Gastrointestinal Cancers With Magnetically Controlled Capsule Gastroscopy

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of our study was to demonstrate the efficacy and feasibility of the medical consortium for screening upper gastrointestinal cancers with magnetically controlled capsule gastroscopy.

detailed_description.textblock: In this study, the investigators designed a propective cohort study to evaluate the the efficacy and feasibility of medical consortium for screening upper gastrointestinal cancers (MCSC) with magnetically controlled capsule gastroscopy (MCCG).

primary_outcome.measure: the incidence of upper gastrointestinal cancers, including gastric cancer and esophageal cancer.

secondary_outcome.measure: tthe focal lesions of upper gastrointestinal tract

arm_group.description: subjects involved in medical consortium for screening upper gastrointestinal canccers(MCSC)

intervention.description: subjects received intensive follow-up by coordinators according to the predifined protocol of MCSC

facility.name: Department of Gastroenterology, Qilu Hospital, Shandong University
